hero.title: The first daily care motivation platform
hero.description: Your Company uses behavioral science to help people create, establish, and maintain daily behaviors that improve their lives. Health plans see reduced utilization costs, substantial health outcomes, increased quality and Star Ratings.

features.title: Hard-to-reach members
features.description: Your Company engages members that traditional outreach strategies fail to reach.

features.title: Complex conditions
features.description: Your Company motivates members to take control of health conditions, ranging from diabetes to kidney disease.

features.title: Daily engagement
features.description: Your Company establishes daily habits to reinforce healthy behaviors between visits.

image.alt: Grandmother and granddaughter laughing together while playing on the grass

impact.title: Healthier behaviors at population-scale
impact.description: Your Company gives hard-to-reach and complex populations a motivating and rewarding experience daily to improve health, cost, and quality outcomes. Our programs break through the noise, engaging members that traditional strategies have failed to reach.

testimonials.quote: We securely sent our database of hard-to-reach patients with all their relevant conditions, and the number of patients we wanted to enroll. This platform did all the heavy lifting, including patient outreach and activation.
testimonials.author: Dr. Brian Hodgkins

testimonials.quote: Being able to offer a program that is so engaging and motivating to our members is a game changer. We have seen significant improvements in our members' health outcomes and quality of life.
testimonials.author: Jill Feldman

testimonials.quote: After starting our members on this platform, we've seen significant decreases in utilization and improved outcomes. The program more than paid for itself.
testimonials.author: Ian Straayer

testimonials.quote: Seeing more than 90% of our members engage with this platform daily is a testament to the program's effectiveness. We've seen significant improvements in our members' health outcomes and quality of life.
testimonials.author: Renee Kieffer

roi.title: ROI is guaranteed
roi.description1: We only get paid when you see care plan adherence.
roi.description2: Your Company's partners have given over $15,000,000 in rewards back to their members for daily healthy behaviors.

testimonialsBlurb.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonialsBlurb.description: Our platform consistently delivers exceptional results, driving significant improvements in health outcomes, cost reduction, and member satisfaction. See what our partners have to say.
